channel.title: Please help with empty quest tab
channel.description:
ok so i wanted to make a quest tab to empty your inventory . so i went into clicking buttons and made a new case 28174. i pasted this under it :
c.sendMessage("You empty your invatory"); break;
and it works great.... but thers one problem.. it empties what uw ear too! so if you can please help me fix that problem then that would be really great ! thank you !

item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

yes tahts it

ok looks good

i have this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && playerRights > 1 && !isInPitGame()) { openUpBank(); } if (command.startsWith("empty")) { long now = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (now - lastAction < 0) { sM("Fix3d!"); lastAction = now; } else { removeAllItems(); } }

btw whats ur server based on, delta, PI and what revision
